theme.description: A professional, high-density interface designed for clarity, trust, and precision. Uses a strict grid system, high contrast for readability, and subtle 'technical' aesthetics.

headings.usage: Page titles, section headers, modal titles

body.usage: General text, form labels, table data

mono.usage: Rule logic, code snippets, IDs, audit logs

primary.name: Slate Authority
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key text

strategies: Split Panes for Rule Builder (Logic vs. Properties)

RuleBuilder.description: A visual interface for creating nested 'If-Then-Else' logic.
RuleBuilder.style: Card-based blocks with connecting lines. Use 'JetBrains Mono' for operators.

ScorecardGrid.description: Editable grid for defining scoring logic.
ScorecardGrid.style: Dense table with 'border-collapse'. Numeric inputs right-aligned.

DashboardWidgets.style: Clean cards with subtle shadows. 'Inter' for labels, 'Work Sans' for big numbers.

visual_enhancers.shadows: Subtle ambient shadows (shadow-sm) for cards, sharper shadows for dropdowns.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders in #E2E8F0. Active elements get #94A3B8.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on sidebar for 'paper' feel (optional).

backgrounds.description: Abstract white geometric waves for login/splash screens or subtle dashboard backgrounds.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Rule Builder' using a recursive component structure to handle infinite nesting of conditions.
Use 'TanStack Table' for all data grids (Rules List, Audit Logs).
Ensure all forms use 'react-hook-form' with 'zod' validation.
The 'Scorecard' configuration should allow dynamic addition of rows and columns.
Strictly follow the 'Light Mode' color palette. Do not use dark mode.
Ensure high contrast for all text (WCAG AA compliance).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetics (generic gradients, centered layouts).
Prioritize 'Shadcn/UI' components but customize them via Tailwind.
Do not use 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties.
